titles: The castell of comforte in the whiche it is euidently proued, [that] God alone absolueth, and freli forgeueth the sinners of so many as vnfaynedly repent, and turne vnto hym Lately compyled by Thomas Becon.
author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.
publisher: By Ihon Daye, dwellinge in Aldersgate, and William Seres, dwellinge in Peter Colledge,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
